Description:
NEW PRICE - Modern, Neat and Fresh
This beautiful single level unit is modern, neat and fresh and sure to appeal to those buyers looking for their 1st home, singles, couples, young families, downsizes or investors.
Nestled at the back of the complex, the unit offers you a spacious floor plan that consists of 2 good sized robed bedrooms, the main at the front takes in views to the garden and is complemented by a walk in robe and ensuite effect bathroom.
The 2 living areas are designed with modern living in mind. The open plan flows from the kitchen with the family meals area then to the living room that views over the backyard and patio.
The centrally located kitchen is well equipped with plenty of cupboards, bench space and dishwasher to ensure the chef of the family makes their kitchen rule for any meal occasion.
Before we take in the outdoors, we mustn't forget other internal features which include gas ducted heating, split system air conditioning, main bathroom with separate toilet, large laundry room, plenty of storage, brand new carpets throughout, new blinds and window furnishings, freshly painted through out in a neutral crisp white and with an abundance of natural light.
Entertaining is made easy in 2 outdoor areas. The courtyard off the kitchen and hallway will be ideal for leisurely weekend breakfasts with a coffee and the paper, whilst the back patio will be perfect for family gatherings, casual BBQ's, alfresco dining or cool afternoon drinks.
Car accommodation is well taken care of in the garage with remote controlled door plus there is internal access to the home.
All this is within a close distance to Churinga Village Shopping Centre that has Coles, Woolworths and Aldi, schools, transport, walking tracks, parklands and easy access to Mt Dandenong Road that takes you through to Croydon, Ringwood, Eastland and Eastlink.

Description:
Charm & Space in the Strathfield Estate
Peacefully tucked away within the classy Strathfield Estate, this sprawling home flawlessly combines period charm with contemporary functionality, in establishing an impressive indoor-outdoor entertainer that modern families with relish.
Fronted by colourful gardens and a tessellated tile porch with picturesque reserve vistas, its exterior appeal is profound and perfectly matched by its light, free-flowing floorplan.
Floating floors and tall ceilings with decorative roses highlight a majestic entry - flanked by a formal lounge with home office access and a deluxe master suite that features a walk-in wardrobe, bay window-wrapped sitting area plus an indulgent spa en-suite. Three additional downstairs bedrooms are located off a rear hall - all containing built-in wardrobes and sharing the use of a central bathroom, separate toilet and wash area.
A gourmet country-chic kitchen is anchored at the heart of the home; containing a 900mm Blanco dual fuel cooker, a dishwasher, copious amounts of cupboard and drawer storage plus stone benches that double as a breakfast bar. The connecting family and dining domain is perfect for enjoying causal meals and spills out via dual sliding doors to a private covered entertaining precinct with ceiling fans and lighting.
Upstairs, an expansive rumpus/recreation room could be set up as the ultimate theatre or games area; boasting an accompanying second master bedroom with walk-in wardrobe and en-suite.
Enriched with a long list of extras, it includes: ducted heating, split system air conditioning, solar panels, laundry with built-in hampers and cupboards, an abundance of linen press and in-roof storage, 2x 1,000L water tanks plus an internal-access remote double garage.
A central cul-de-sac style location completes the picture-perfect family package. Accessing trails, Douglas Maggs Reserve, buses, family restaurants and childcare centres on foot. A quick, easy commute to primary schools, Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, McAdam Square, Croydon Central Shopping Centre, Croydon Main Street and Train Station, Eastland and the EastLink freeway.
* Sprawling family home in the Strathfield Estate
* 3 large living zones; including a formal lounge, family/dining and a rumpus/recreation room
* Gourmet country-chic kitchen with quality appliances and stone benches
* Five bedrooms complemented by three bathrooms
* Private covered entertaining precinct with ceiling fans and lighting
* Heating, cooling and solar panels
* Home office with internal-access to the remote double garage
* In a cul-de-sac style setting that rests opposite a reserve - reaching buses, family restaurants, premium schools, McAdam Square, Croydon's town centre and train station within minutes
10% deposit, balance in 120 days
